column3:
Just tested this. Found one issue: looks like the script hangs indefinitely when providing an argument that doesn't match any files.
E.g.
```
./verify.sh 0.12.0-linx
```
I'll fix it, thanks for the feedback.

Updated: if a platform name is provided that doesn't match any files, it will fail now with an error instead of hanging.\n\nNB: I don't know why the windows travis-CI build failed, looks unrelated to this...
